name: New Jewel 2017 - Match3 game
description:
New Jewel 2017 - Match3 game is a classic diamond match game. This puzzle game is very attractive. Just touch, touch and swap jewels, you score. Many cool blasting effect awaiting you.
- Cool different diamonds
- Beautiful mania blast effects.
- 100+ level and updating
- Top blasting diamond ranking board
- Invite friend playing together
